files.Title: RichHudFramework.AggregateException
files.Summary: Aggregates multiple exceptions into a single exception with a combined message. Used by for clean error reporting when parallel tasks fail.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.Client.RichHudClient
files.Summary:
API Client for the Rich HUD Framework.

This class handles the initialization and registration of a mod with the Rich HUD Master module.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.EventHandler
files.Summary:
Represents a method that will handle an event, similar to System.EventHandler.

For input or value change events on UI elements, the sender will usually be .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.IIndexedCollection<T>
files.Summary: Minimal interface for any indexed collection exposing a count and an indexer.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.IO.LocalFileIO
files.Summary:
Handles basic file I/O operations in the mod's local storage.

Ensures thread safety by preventing concurrent operations on this specific instance.

Wrapper around local storage file utilities.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.IO.ReadOnlyModFileIO
files.Summary:
Handles read-only file operations for files located within the mod's directory.

Wrapper around mod location file utils.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.IPooledObjectPolicy<T>
files.Summary: Defines the creation and reset behavior for objects managed by an .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.KnownException
files.Summary: Marks an exception as expected/known (e.g., failed file load, invalid user data). Allows the framework to distinguish between bugs and recoverable errors.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.ListPoolPolicy<T>
files.Summary: implementation specialized for . Reuses lists by calling instead of allocating new ones.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.MathUtils
files.Summary: Mathematical utilities, particularly work-arounds for missing BitConverter functionality in Space Engineers mod API.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.ObjectPool<T>
files.Summary: Simple, non-thread-safe object pool backed by a . Reduces allocations for frequently created/disposed reference types.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.PooledObjectPolicy<T>
files.Summary: Delegate-based implementation of .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.StringBuilderPoolPolicy
files.Summary: implementation for . Reuses instances by clearing them instead of allocating new ones.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BindAliasDefinition
files.Summary: Wrapper for serializing bind aliases (alternate key combinations) to XML.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BindDefinition
files.Summary:
Serializable container for individual key binds.

Includes the bind name, the primary control combination, and any optional aliases.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BindGroupInitializer
files.Summary:
A collection designed to simplify the definition and registration of groups of key binds.

Supports mixed control types (Strings, MyKeys, RichHudControls, JoystickButtons) via .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BindInputElement
files.Summary: Attaches custom control-bind (key/combo) event handling to a UI element. Allows arbitrary definitions to trigger NewPressed/PressedAndHeld/Released events on a specific UI node, optionally requiring input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BorderBox
files.Summary: A UI element that renders a textured frame. Supports coloring, transparency, texture alignment/scaling, and masking.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BorderedButton
files.Summary:
styled to closely match the appearance of buttons in the SE terminal.

Formatting temporarily changes when it gains input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.BorderedCheckBox
files.Summary:
Bordered checkbox designed to mimic the appearance of the checkbox used in the SE terminal.

Does not have a label. Use for a version with a label.

Formatting temporarily changes when it gains input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Button
files.Summary:
Clickable button with a textured background.

No styling by default; it's just a clickable with highlighting.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.CamSpaceNode
files.Summary:
HudSpace node that builds its Plane-to-World matrix directly from the player camera.

In its default state this exactly replicates the vanilla transform (screen-space UI). By modifying its properties you can create rotated, offset, or world-space (non-screen-space) HUDs that still follow the camera.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ChainSelectionBox<TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: A non-scrolling list of arbitrary selectable UI elements. Specialization of SelectionBox using HudChain

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ChainSelectionBoxBase<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Abstract selection box that uses a as its backing list. Intended for fixed-size lists that do not require scrolling.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.BindManager
files.Summary: The central hub for creating and retrieving key binds, control groups, and configuring input blacklisting in the framework.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.ControlCategory
files.Summary: Represents a horizontally scrolling row of s within a in the .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.ControlPage
files.Summary: A page that organizes settings into vertically scrolling s in the .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.ControlTile
files.Summary:
Represents a vertical layout column within a in the .

Tiles are organized horizontally within a category. Each tile should generally contain no more than 3 controls to maintain proper UI scaling and layout bounds.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.HudMain
files.Summary: Primary entry point for the client-side UI system. Provides shared access to root UI nodes, cursor, clipboard, screen metrics, and world-space projection utilities.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.RebindPage
files.Summary: A terminal page designed specifically for managing key bindings. Presents binds from a in a scrolling list in the with a pop-up dialog for changing key combinations when a bind is selected by the user.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.RichHudTerminal
files.Summary: The central windowed settings menu shared by all mods using the framework.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalButton
files.Summary:
A clickable button control for a .

Mimics the appearance of the standard Space Engineers terminal button.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalCheckbox
files.Summary:
A boolean checkbox control for a .

Mimics the appearance of the standard Space Engineers terminal checkbox.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalColorPicker
files.Summary:
An RGB color picker using three sliders (Red, Green, Blue) for s.

Designed to mimic the appearance of the color picker in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalControlBase
files.Summary: The abstract base class for all controls in the

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalDragBox
files.Summary:
A control allowing the user to visually select a 2D screen position (Vector2) for a .

Spawns a temporary draggable window when interacted with. Useful for configuring HUD element positions.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalDropdown<T>
files.Summary:
A collapsing dropdown list with a label. For s.

Designed to mimic the appearance of the dropdown in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalLabel
files.Summary: A static text label for a .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalList<T>
files.Summary:
A non-collapsing, fixed-height list box with a label. For s.

Designed to mimic the appearance of the list box in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalOnOffButton
files.Summary:
An On/Off toggle button used for s.

Mimics the appearance of the "On/Off" button in the SE Terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalPageBase
files.Summary: Abstract base for interfacing with terminal page implementations

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalPageCategory
files.Summary:
A collapsable group of RHF terminal pages that can be added to a mod's control root.

Functions as a folder in the sidebar navigation.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalPageCategoryBase
files.Summary: Abstract base class for terminal page containers/groups.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalSlider
files.Summary:
A labeled slider for selecting float values within a specific range. For s.

Mimics the appearance of the slider in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalTextField
files.Summary:
A single-line text input field with a configurable character filter. For s.

Mimics the appearance of the text field in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TerminalValue<TValue>
files.Summary: Abstract base class for terminal controls that are associated with a specific data value (e.g., sliders, checkboxes) in the .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Client.TextPage
files.Summary:
A scrolling page of wrapped, read-only text in the .

Useful for help screens, changelogs, or information displays.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.CmdGroupInitializer
files.Summary: A helper container used to define a list of commands and their callbacks before registering them to a .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.CmdManager
files.Summary: Singleton Session Component responsible for managing chat command registration, parsing incoming chat messages, and executing matching commands.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ColorPickerHSV
files.Summary:
A named color picker using sliders designed to mimic the appearance of the Space Engineers terminal color picker.

Operating in HSV mode (Hue, Saturation, Value). Alpha (transparency) is not supported.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ColorPickerRGB
files.Summary:
A named color picker component utilizing RGB sliders, styled to mimic the Space Engineers terminal interface.

Operating in RGB mode. Alpha (transparency) is not supported.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ControlHandle
files.Summary:
A unified handle for referencing UI controls.

Abstracts the differences between (Keyboard), (Mouse/Custom), and (Gamepad) by wrapping them in a unique integer ID.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.CustomSpaceNode
files.Summary:
HudSpace node that uses a completely user-supplied world matrix each frame. If no delegate is assigned, the node simply inherits its parent's Plane-to-World matrix.

Ideal for attaching UI to moving cockpits, turret bases, custom billboards, etc.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.DimAlignments
files.Summary: Automatic size matching flags for

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.DoubleLabelBox
files.Summary: A text box with a text field on the left and another on the right.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Dropdown<TValue>
files.Summary:
Collapsable list box. Designed to mimic the appearance of the dropdown in the SE terminal.

Alias of using and as the container and element, respectively.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Dropdown<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary:
Collapsable list box. Designed to mimic the appearance of the dropdown in the SE terminal.

Alias of using as the container.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Dropdown<TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Generic collapsable list box. Allows use of custom entry element types. Designed to mimic the appearance of the dropdown in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.EmptyHudElement
files.Summary:
A bare HUD element that renders nothing, does no input handling.

Useful for organizing or grouping UI elements in an area using and

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.EntryData<T>
files.Summary: Represents a single entry in a ListBox or Dropdown.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.GlyphFormat
files.Summary: Defines the formatting applied to characters in and . Includes color, font, style, size, and alignment.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudChain<TElementContainer>
files.Summary:
Organizes child elements into a linear stack, either horizontally or vertically.

Alias of .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudChain<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Organizes child elements into a linear stack, either horizontally or vertically. Conceptually similar to a CSS Flexbox or a UI StackPanel.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudChain
files.Summary:
Organizes child elements into a linear stack, either horizontally or vertically.

Alias of .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudChainSizingModes
files.Summary: Controls the sizing behavior of the and its members. The "Align Axis" is the direction the elements are stacked (Vertical = Y, Horizontal = X). The "Off Axis" is perpendicular to the stack (Vertical = X, Horizontal = Y).

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudCollection<TElementContainer>
files.Summary:
Generic collection of HUD elements, each wrapped in a decorator container. Elements inside containers are parented directly to this collection (not to their containers). Supports full IList-like manipulation while ensuring proper registration/unregistration with the HUD tree.

Alias for where the element type is .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudCollection<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Generic collection of HUD elements, each wrapped in a decorator container. Elements inside containers are parented directly to this collection (not to their containers). Supports full IList-like manipulation while ensuring proper registration/unregistration with the HUD tree.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudCollection
files.Summary:
Generic collection of HUD elements, each wrapped in a decorator container. Elements inside containers are parented directly to this collection (not to their containers). Supports full IList-like manipulation while ensuring proper registration/unregistration with the HUD tree.

Alias for using as the wrapper and as the element type.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudElementBase
files.Summary: Abstract base for all UI elements with definite size and position. Extends HudParentBase and HudNodeBase.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudElementContainer<TElement>
files.Summary: Standard container class for members.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudElementContainer
files.Summary: Standard container class for members using the base .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudElementTuple<TData>
files.Summary: Container class used to associate a base with an arbitrary data object.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudElementTuple<TElement, TData>
files.Summary: Container class used to associate a entry with an arbitrary data object.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudInputMode
files.Summary: Used to indicate the global input state of the framework

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudNodeBase
files.Summary: Abstract base for hud elements that can be parented to other elements.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudNodeContainer<TElement>
files.Summary:
Base container class for generic members.

Can be extended to associate data with arbitrary HUD nodes.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudNodeContainer
files.Summary: Standard container class for members using the base .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudParentBase
files.Summary: Abstract base for HUD elements to which other elements are parented. Types deriving from this class cannot be parented to other elements; only types of can be parented.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.HudSpaceNodeBase
files.Summary:
Abstract base for all HUD nodes that define their own custom coordinate space (replacing the default screen-space Pixel-to-World transform with an arbitrary world matrix).

Provides cursor projection, facing/in-front detection, and origin retrieval for derived classes.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IBind
files.Summary: Interface representing an input tied to one or more key combinations in a

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IBindEventProxy
files.Summary: Provides per-bind event proxies (NewPressed / PressedAndHeld / Released) for custom control bindings attached to a UI element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IBindGroup
files.Summary: A collection of unique keybinds in the

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IBindInput
files.Summary: Allows a UI element to respond to arbitrary custom control binds ().

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IBindInputElement
files.Summary: Marks a UI element as supporting custom bind input via an instance.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IChainElementContainer<TElement>
files.Summary:
Interface for objects containing UI elements compatible with .

Provides layout weighting information required for proportional sizing.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IChatCommand
files.Summary: Represents a single chat command registered within a .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IClickableElement
files.Summary: Indicates that a UI element supports mouse interaction via an instance.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ICommandGroup
files.Summary: Represents a collection of s that share a common prefix (e.g., "/modname").

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IControl
files.Summary: Interface for controls used by the

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ICursor
files.Summary: Represents the global mouse cursor managed by Rich HUD Framework. Provides screen/world position, capture state, and tooltip registration functionality. Used by all clickable UI elements for correct hit-testing and interaction within and between HUD spaces.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IEntryBox<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Minimal interface for UI elements that represent a collection of selectable .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IFocusHandler
files.Summary: Manages keyboard/input focus for a UI element. Only one element in the entire UI can have focus at a time. Input-related events use as the sender object.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IFocusableElement
files.Summary: Represents a UI element that can receive keyboard/input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IHudCollection<TElementContainer>
files.Summary:
Mutable interface for HUD collections supporting decorator-wrapped child elements.

Alias of using as the element type.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IHudCollection<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Mutable interface for HUD collections supporting decorator-wrapped child elements.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IHudCollection
files.Summary:
Mutable interface for HUD collections supporting decorator-wrapped child elements.

Alias of using as the element type and as the wrapper.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IHudNodeContainer<TElement>
files.Summary:
Interface for objects acting as decorator wrappers for UI elements.

Separates the UI element from metadata.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ILabelElement
files.Summary: Interface for UI elements rendering formatted

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IListBoxEntry<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Interface implemented by objects that function as list box entries, pairing specific data types with a label-based UI element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IMinLabelElement
files.Summary: Minimal interface for UI elements rendering formatted

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IModControlRoot
files.Summary:
Interface for the root category for the client's settings.

This is the entry point where pages and subcategories are added.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IModRootMember
files.Summary: Interface for items that can be added to a mod's control root

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IMouseInput
files.Summary: Low-level mouse input handler providing cursor enter/exit detection and click events. Events are raised using the owning as the sender.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudCollection<TElementContainer>
files.Summary:
Read-only interface for collections of HUD elements wrapped in decorator containers.

Alias for with as the element type.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudCollection<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Read-only interface for collections of HUD elements wrapped in decorator containers.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudCollection
files.Summary:
Default read-only collection interface using standard container and element types.

Alias for with as the element type and as the wrapper.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudElement
files.Summary: Read-only interface for hud elements with definite size and position.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudNode
files.Summary: Read-only interface for hud elements that can be parented to another element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudParent
files.Summary: Read-only interface for types capable of serving as parent objects to s.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IReadOnlyHudSpaceNode
files.Summary: Interface for all HUD nodes that define their own custom coordinate space.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IScrollBoxEntry<TElement>
files.Summary: Interface for container entries within a scrollable list or box.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IScrollBoxEntryTuple<TElement, TData>
files.Summary: Interface for scrollbox entries that associate an arbitrary data object with the UI element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ISelectionBoxEntry<TElement>
files.Summary:
Interface for a selection box entry wrapping a UI element.

Adds selection highlighting capabilities to the standard scroll box entry.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ISelectionBoxEntryTuple<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Interface for a selection box entry that pairs a UI element with a data value of type TValue.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IValueControl<T>
files.Summary: Minimal interface for UI elements controlling a value that invokes an event when changed, with a property for reading that value.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.IValueControl
files.Summary: Minimal interface for UI elements controlling a value that invokes an event when changed.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.InputFocusHandler
files.Summary: Default implementation of . Handles acquiring and releasing global input focus through and raises the appropriate events.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.KeyComboInit
files.Summary:
Helper class for defining a specific combination of controls (up to 3).

Used with to specify bind combos or aliases.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Label
files.Summary: A HUD element dedicated to rendering formatted . This element acts as a wrapper for the underlying .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.LabelBox
files.Summary: A composite UI element that renders text over a textured background.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.LabelBoxBase
files.Summary: Abstract base class for UI elements that combine a text label with a textured background.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.LabelBoxButton
files.Summary: Clickable button with text on top of a textured background with highlighting.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.LabelButton
files.Summary:
Clickable text element. Text only, no background.

No styling by default; it's just a clickable with no highlighting.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.LabelElementBase
files.Summary: Abstract base class for UI elements responsible for rendering text.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ListBox<TValue>
files.Summary:
Scrollable list of text elements. Each list entry is associated with a TValue

Alias of using and as the container and element, respectively.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ListBox<TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Generic scrollable list of text elements. Allows use of custom entry element types. Each list entry is associated with a TValue

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ListBoxEntry<TValue>
files.Summary: A List Box entry that associates a with an object of type TValue.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ListBoxEntry<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: A concrete implementation of a List Box entry, pairing a text element with a data value.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ListInputElement<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Specialized that manages selection, mouse highlighting, and keyboard navigation for scrollable lists (vertical or horizontal). Supports both mouse and keyboard-driven selection.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.MouseInputElement
files.Summary: Core mouse interaction component for clickable UI elements. Handles cursor enter/exit, left/right clicks, tooltip registration, and automatic focus acquisition on click.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.NamedCheckBox
files.Summary:
Named checkbox designed to mimic the appearance of checkboxes used in the SE terminal.

Adds a label to .

Formatting temporarily changes when it gains input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.NamedOnOffButton
files.Summary:
A labeled pair of horizontally aligned on and off bordered buttons used to indicate a boolean value. Made to resemble on/off toggle used in the SE terminal.

Adds a label to .

Formatting temporarily changes when it gains input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.NamedSliderBox
files.Summary:
A composite control containing a horizontal slider box, a name label, and a value label.

Note: The value label is not updated automatically; it must be updated manually via the ValueChanged event.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.OnOffButton
files.Summary:
A pair of horizontally aligned on and off bordered buttons used to indicate a boolean value. Styled to resemble on/off button used in the SE terminal.

Does not have a label. Use for a version with a label.

Formatting temporarily changes when it gains input focus.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ParentAlignments
files.Summary: Used to determine the default position of an element relative to its parent via .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.RadialSelectionBox<TContainer>
files.Summary:
Generic radial selection box allowing custom containers while keeping as the element type.

Alias of using as the element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.RadialSelectionBox<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Generic radial selection wheel (pie-menu style). Displays a collection of entries arranged in a circular pattern around a central point. Supports both cursor-based and gesture-based (drag-to-select) input methods.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.RadialSelectionBox
files.Summary:
Non-generic radial selection box using the default container with plain elements.

Alias of using and as the container and element, respectively.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.BlockBoard
files.Summary: Draws a 3D rectangular prism using billboards in world space. Useful for drawing bounding boxes.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.BoundedQuadBoard
files.Summary: A container struct associating a definition with specific 2D bounds.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.BoundedQuadMaterial
files.Summary: Defines the visual properties for rendering a quad where the texture coordinates are axis-aligned and defined by a bounding box (Min/Max). This is optimized for standard sprites or full textures without distortion.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.Client.FontManager
files.Summary:
Client-side API for the font management system. Allows mods to query registered fonts and register custom fonts at runtime.

Most frequently used by internally when setting font or style.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.CroppedBox
files.Summary: Represents a bounding box paired with a masking box. The mask is used to clip the rendering of the associated billboard, acting as a scissor rectangle.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.FlatQuad
files.Summary: Represents a 2D quadrilateral defined by four points. Used for both screen-space geometry definitions and texture coordinate (UV) mapping.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.FontStyles
files.Summary: Font styles used by RHF. Regular, italic and underline styling is always available. Bolding requires optional font atlases that may or may not be present.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.IFontMin
files.Summary: Simplified Font interface for use by HUD API clients.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.ILine
files.Summary:
Represents a single horizontal line of text within a .

This interface serves as a collection of and stores line-specific layout properties, such as the line's dimensions and vertical offset.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.IReadOnlyMaterialFrame
files.Summary: Read-only interface defining the mapping of a material to a quad.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.IRichChar
files.Summary:
Represents a single glyph within a rich text element.

This interface exposes the character content, its specific formatting (font/color), and its calculated layout geometry (size/offset) relative to the container.

Warning: This object is a transient flyweight. It points to an index in a mutable buffer. Do not store references to across text updates. If the parent text changes, this interface may point to stale or recycled data.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.ITextBoard
files.Summary:
Represents a renderable text element that supports rich text formatting, scrolling, and advanced layout.

This interface combines text manipulation (via ) with rendering logic. It handles text clipping, auto-resizing, text alignment, and coordinate-based character lookups.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.ITextBuilder
files.Summary:
A mutable collection of lines and characters that supports RichText formatting.

Functioning similarly to a , this interface allows for appending, inserting, and removing text while maintaining formatting data (colors, fonts) and handling line wrapping modes (Unlined, Lined, Wrapped).

Supports for getting plain text copies.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.MatBoard
files.Summary: A high-level wrapper for drawing textured, colored, and optionally clipped rectangular billboards. Utilizes for rendering.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.Material
files.Summary: Represents a handle to a Space Engineers Transparent Material. Supports defining full textures or specific sprites (texture regions) within a texture atlas.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.MaterialAlignment
files.Summary: Defines how a texture is mapped to the geometry of the UI element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.MaterialFrame
files.Summary: Manages the positioning, scaling, and alignment of a on a QuadBoard. Handles calculations for aspect-ratio preservation via UV cropping or geometry scaling.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.PolyBoard
files.Summary: Renders a regular 2D polygon (e.g., triangle, hexagon, circle approximation) using billboards. The shape is constructed as a triangle fan from the center.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.PolyMaterial
files.Summary: Defines the visual properties for rendering arbitrary N-sided polygons, including a list of specific texture coordinates matching the polygon's vertices.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.PuncturedPolyBoard
files.Summary: Renders a circular 2D polygon (annulus) using billboards with the center removed. Geometry is constructed as a strip of quads connecting an inner and outer ring.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.QuadBoard
files.Summary: Defines the visual properties of a rectangular billboard, including its texture, color, texture coordinates, and skew.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.QuadBoardData
files.Summary: Contains the final geometry and material data for a , ready to be submitted to the renderer.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.QuadMaterial
files.Summary: Defines the visual properties for rendering a quadrilateral using explicit texture coordinates for each corner, allowing for non-rectangular UV mappings (e.g., distortion or rotation).

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.TriMaterial
files.Summary: Defines the visual properties (texture, color, and UV mapping) for rendering a single triangle billboard.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.Triangle
files.Summary: Represents a 2D triangle defined by three points. Used primarily for texture coordinate (UV) mapping or screen-space geometry.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.Rendering.TriangleD
files.Summary: Represents a 3D triangle defined by three double-precision world coordinates. Used for defining world-space geometry.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.RichHudControls
files.Summary: Unified control enum type for keyboard, mouse and gamepad/joystick

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.RichText
files.Summary: Reusable rich text builder designed for efficient construction and reuse of formatted text. Internally minimises StringBuilder allocations by merging consecutive text segments that share identical formatting.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScaledSpaceNode
files.Summary: A specialized HUD space node that rescales the X/Y (Right/Up) plane of its parent's plane-to-world transformation matrix, enlarging or shrinking all child UI elements attached to it uniformly.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBar
files.Summary: A clickable scrollbar designed to approximate the appearance of standard Space Engineers scrollbars.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBox<TElementContainer>
files.Summary:
A scrollable container for HUD elements, based on . It clips content that exceeds its bounds and provides a scrollbar for navigation.

Alias of with as the element type.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBox<TElementContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: A scrollable container for HUD elements, based on . It clips content that exceeds its bounds and provides a scrollbar for navigation.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBox
files.Summary:
A scrollable container for HUD elements, based on . It clips content that exceeds its bounds and provides a scrollbar for navigation.

Alias of with as the container and as the element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBoxEntry<TElement>
files.Summary:
Base container class for ScrollBox members.

Adds an state to the standard .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBoxEntry
files.Summary: Base container class for ScrollBox members using .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBoxEntryTuple<TData>
files.Summary: Container class associating a base ScrollBox element with an arbitrary object of type TData.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollBoxEntryTuple<TElement, TData>
files.Summary: Container class associating a ScrollBox element with an arbitrary object of type TData.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollSelectionBox<TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: A scrollable list of arbitrary selectable UI elements. Generic SelectionBox using ScrollBox

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ScrollSelectionBoxBase<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Abstract selection box that uses a as its backing list. Supports scrolling (mouse wheel + scrollbar).

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SeBlacklistModes
files.Summary:
Flags determining which game inputs are blocked (blacklisted) by the framework.

Useful for modifying or disabling normal game input behavior while UI elements are active.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SelectionBox<TChain, TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Generic list of pooled, selectable entries of uniform size.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SelectionBoxBase<TChain, TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Core abstract base class for selection box controls. Manages a list of entries, keyboard/mouse selection, highlighting, and visual feedback (selection box + highlight box).

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SelectionBoxEntry<TElement>
files.Summary:
Implementation of a Selection Box entry.

Manages enablement and highlighting permissions for the contained element.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SelectionBoxEntryTuple<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Implementation of a Selection Box entry that pairs the element with a value.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SharedBinds
files.Summary: A collection of immutable, commonly used key binds used by the framework library.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SliderBar
files.Summary:
A clickable slider bar consisting of a track (Bar) and a movable thumb (Slider), based on . It can be oriented vertically or horizontally, and the current value is automatically clamped between min and max.

Size is determined by the slider and bar, not or .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.SliderBox
files.Summary: A horizontal slider control designed to mimic the appearance of the standard sliders found in the Space Engineers terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TerminalFormatting
files.Summary: Colors and text formatting used in styling the Rich HUD Terminal and other UI elements themed on the Space Engineers terminal style.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TextAlignment
files.Summary: Used to determine text alignment.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TextBox
files.Summary: Interactive, clickable text box with caret and highlighting. Text only, no background or scrollbars.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TextBuilderModes
files.Summary: Line breaking modes for

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TextField
files.Summary: Unlined clickable textbox with a background and border designed to look like text fields in the SE terminal.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TextInput
files.Summary: Provides a simple mechanism for handling text input, integrating with the game's input system to process characters and backspace events.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TexturedBox
files.Summary: A UI element that renders a textured rectangle. Supports coloring, transparency, texture alignment/scaling, and masking.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.ToolTip
files.Summary:
Class used to define tooltips attached to the RHF cursor.

Set via the property of the given UI element, or registered to manually in HandleInput() every input tick.

The first tooltip registered takes precedence.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeBox<TValue>
files.Summary:
Tree box supporting custom entry types of arbitrary height, provided they have a label.

Alias of with as the element and as the container.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeBox<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Generic tree box supporting custom entry types of arbitrary height, provided they have a label.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeBoxBase<TContainer, TElement>.TreeChainSelectionBox
files.Summary: Minimal used internally by .

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeBoxBase<TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary:
Abstract, generic base class for tree-style dropdown lists Provides a collapsible hierarchy of entries with a header that toggles visibility of the list.

Alias for using default non-scrolling chain and selection box types

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeBoxBase<TSelectionBox, TChain, TContainer, TElement>
files.Summary: Fully generic abstract base for tree box controls. Combines a clickable header (with expand/collapse arrow) and a dropdown selection list that appears below it when opened.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeList<TValue>
files.Summary:
Indented, collapsable list. Designed to fit in with SE UI elements.

Alias of using and as the container and element, respectively.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeList<TElement, TValue>
files.Summary:
Indented, collapsable list. Designed to fit in with SE UI elements.

Alias of using as the container.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.TreeList<TContainer, TElement, TValue>
files.Summary: Generic indented collapsable list of pooled, uniformly-sized entries. Allows use of custom entry element types. Designed to fit in with SE UI elements.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.UI.WindowBase
files.Summary: Base class for a standard window element featuring a header, body, and border. Includes built-in support for mouse dragging, edge resizing, and focus management.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.Utils.Color
files.Summary: Utilities for parsing and formatting values from/to strings. Supports common formats such as "255,255,255", " 100, 50, 0 ", or "128,64,32,255".

files.Title: RichHudFramework.Utils.Debug
files.Summary: Debugging and runtime assertion utilities.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.Utils.ProtoBuf
files.Summary: Safe wrappers around Space Engineers' built-in ProtoBuf serialization utilities. Catches exceptions and returns them as instead of letting them propagate.

files.Title: RichHudFramework.Utils.Xml
files.Summary: Safe wrappers around Space Engineers' built-in XML serialization utilities. Exceptions are caught and returned as rather than thrown.
